channel.title: Lilium Regale on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Lilium Regale on funPlantGenes

item.title: LrABCF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrABCF1 Gene Name: ATP-binding cassette transporter1 Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: LrABCF1, a GCN-type ATP-binding cassette transporter from Lilium regale, is involved in defense responses against viral and fungal pathogens.

item.title: LrDef1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrDef1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: Lilium regale Wilson WRKY3 modulates an antimicrobial peptide gene, LrDef1, during response to Fusarium oxysporum.

item.title: LrNAC35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0012070 Gene Symbol: LrNAC35 Gene Name: NAC domain-containing protein 35-like Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: Ectopic overexpression of LrNAC35 alters flowering time in petunia.

item.title: LrWRKY3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrWRKY3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: Lilium regale Wilson WRKY3 (LrWRKY3) modulates an antimicrobial peptide gene, LrDef1, during response to Fusarium oxysporum.
